item.description:
This will be a Happy Hour and Networking event at Angelicos in Glastonbury.

As a member of All Around East Hartford, organized by Sean Allen, I have seen Sean's group grow from 4 to 20 people.
A lot of activity is happening with some very good referrals.

The event will be held on Thursday, April 1st from 4:00 - 6:30 PM at Angelico's. The address is 40 Glastonbury Boulevard in Glastonbury, CT.

We have part of the bar reserved.

The happy hour specials are as follows:

$3 appetizers
$7 martini of the day
$5 red/white wine of the day
$3 beer of the day


I will be ramping up events all around the state, in the coming months to grow this meetup.
You will also learn about some of the new networking and lead generation tools that will help you grow your business.

Remember, that it is all about referrals. You reap what you sow. You need to plant the seeds to be able to harvest the crops. The key to success is help others to grow their business and a fews good rainmakers will reciprocate. It only takes 2 good rainmakers with good referrals to fuel your growth. It is still up to you to work the leads, provide excellent customer service, and ask for referrals.

See You there and bring lots of business cards!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the bar area. Ask for Tom Psillas or Sean Allen

group.name: Rainmakers Business Strategy / Networking Meetup Group 06066

item.name: RainMakers Meetup and All Around East Hartford Networking Group Joint Event
